last_episode_to_air.name: The Bat Pack
last_episode_to_air.overview: Three vampires come to town and try to show Sabrina a good time.

name: Sabrina: The Animated Series
overview: Sabrina: The Animated Series is an American animated television series based on the Archie Comics character Sabrina, the Teenage Witch. It was produced by Savage Studios Ltd. and Hartbreak Films in association with DIC Entertainment, which was owned by Disney at the time. The cartoon series is a spin-off of the popular live action series that ran on ABC. Later, a movie, Sabrina: Friends Forever, and a spin-off series, Sabrina's Secret Life, were produced by DiC, this time without the ownership of Disney. Reruns currently air on the "This Is for Kids" block on the TV channel This.

episodes.name: Most Dangerous Witch
episodes.overview: Zelda has a dream about Tim the Witch Smeller, a revenge-seeking witch hunter! Later, Tim comes to Greendale and accidently kidnaps Harvey!

episodes.name: You Said A Mouse-ful
episodes.overview: After salem eats the mouse for Sabrina's science project Sabrina turns him into a mouse so that he can be their lab rat for the science fair, but nasa thinks he's some kind of super-intelligent rat but they want to launch him into space!

episodes.name: Boogie Shoes
episodes.overview: Sabrina wants to improve Harvey's dancing by giving him some magic shoes. But then she comes to find out that Sabrina got the shoes from a dancing wizard. Now the shoes will never let Harvey stop dancin.

episodes.name: Tail Of Two Kitties
episodes.overview: Sabrina enters Salem in a cat contest and Harvey enters his cat in a contest. When Harvey's cat wins Salem meets up with that cat and finds out that she's his lost lover. Suddenly they renew their love lives and start dating again but Sabrina overhears her and says that she plans to marry Salem so she can turn back into a witch again!

episodes.name: The Senses-Shattering Adventures Of Captain Harvtastic
episodes.overview: Sabrina gets a wishing star to grant Harvey a wish (so he will have enough courage to show a comic at a convention) but Sabrina, Harvey and Salem get sucked into Harvey's comic!

episodes.name: Witch Switch
episodes.overview: Sabrina wants to swap lives with Gem so she can have things easier.

episodes.name: Picture Perfect
episodes.overview: Sabrina competes with Gem to be student of the year.

episodes.name: Field Trippin'
episodes.overview: Sabrina wants tickets to The Bubblegum Girls concert but she doesn't have any money to buy it. She decides to babysit two little brats along with Harvey to gain the money. They all go to an art museum but when Sabrina cast a spell on the twins they and Harvey alll go inside the paintings! She spends her whole day trying to find them but tries to not lose her cool. In the end she gets them all out of the art and have turn the boys into real artist. The mother is so proud that she gives Sabrina the money and as a bonus gives her 4 tickets to The Bubblegum Girls concert.

episodes.name: No Time To Be A Hero
episodes.overview: Sabrina is getting lots of praise since everyone thought she saved Harvey's life. So now she has to go back in time to sort things out.

episodes.name: Extreme Harvey
episodes.overview: Harvey thinks he 's the best at skateboarding but Sabrina thinks he needs a little more practice. Gem uses this to her advantage to get with Harvey and tries to put him on a professional team but when they don't accept him Sabrina puts a spell on him to be a great skateboarder. He soon becomes so good that he is featured on every magazine but there's only one problem. The spell can run out at any time!

episodes.name: Shrink To Fit
episodes.overview: Gem has the new Waif Moif jeans and at first Sabrina and Chloe don't like it but when Harvey does they decide to get in with it. At first they can't fit the jeans but when they use a shrinking spell they don't lose a couple of pounds they lose a couple of inches!

episodes.name: Has Anybody Seen My Quigley?
episodes.overview: Quigley moves out when he feels unneeded in he Spellman house, but the girls realize that they can't be alone and need him.

episodes.name: Wag The Witch
episodes.overview: Sabrina is running for class president but Gem is determined to prove Sabrina's weird.

episodes.name: Witchy Grrrls
episodes.overview: Greendale throws a talent show and everyone enters it. Sabrina, Aunt Zelda, Aunt Hilda, and Chloe decide to form a rock group called the Flavor Babes, but they are bad and they lose the competition to Gem. After failure they all decide to use a spell to make them better and famous like pop stars. It works but they end up being snobs and seperating the group!

episodes.name: Paranormal Pi
episodes.overview: Pi wanted a machine that is attracted to magical forces. He couldn't buy one since it was too expensive, so he made a replicant instead and gets a reading from the Spellman house, and also from Sabrina.  Meanwhile, Uncle Zamboni comes to visit and they must wait on him hand and foot.  Also, Salem tries to convince Uncle Zamboni to change him back into a person.

episodes.name: Anywhere But Here
episodes.overview: Sabrina wants to be an adult and she gets her wish! Then things start getting stressful....

episodes.name: Nothin' Says Lovin' Like Somethin' From A Coven
episodes.overview: When Sabrina hears Gem bragging about a Halloween party that she invited everyone in school, except Sabrina, to, Chloe talks Sabrina into hosting a party of her own, providing she can trick Uncle Quigley into leaving the house for the evening. When conventional plans tax her budget, Sabrina turns to magic to liven up the event, and everything goes wrong.

episodes.name: Once Upon A Whine
episodes.overview: While Sabrina is cleaning, she accidently brings Cinderella into reality.

episodes.name: Documagicary
episodes.overview: A tarantula-like person (and his ghostly cameraman) put Sabrina in a documentary called 'That Witch'. Sabrina is glad that she can 'control her own life' but she finds out being a star's not all it's cracked up to be and then she quits. Then, Tim the Witch Smeller is released from prison!

episodes.name: The Grandparent Trap
episodes.overview: Sabrina gets a message from her Grandparents saying they have to make an important announcement. Because they've been seperated for months she thinks that they are getting a divorce so Hilda, Zelda, Quigley, and Sabrina try to help keep them together and save their marriage, but not Salem because he thinks Sabrina has jumped to conclusions. The fights between the couple worsens and when Sabrina thinks that all hope is lost her Grandparents finally make their announcement stating that they want to renew their wedding vows.

episodes.name: I Got Glue Babe
episodes.overview: A failed 'togetherness' spell results in Gem and Sabrina getting stuck together.

episodes.name: Boy Meets Bike
episodes.overview: A bike Sabrina gets Harvey usin magic takes on a mind of it's own during a bike race.

episodes.name: Upside Down Town
episodes.overview: Sabrina makes a magic cake that makes everyone change their ways.

episodes.name: The Importance Of Being Norma
episodes.overview: Sabrina wants to be part of the cheerleading squad next year. Everything's perfact untill her old time freind from kindergarten comes and ruins everything. The cheerleading squad say's she has to ditch norma to have a better chance of being in the squad. So sabrina give norma a makeover but it fails. So she uses the spooky jar and makes everyone like norma . But the spell get's out of hand and sabrina brakes the spell and does'nt want to be in the squad. And stays freinds with norma.

episodes.name: Stage Fright
episodes.overview: Romeo is brought into reality so Zelda can have a prom date and so Sabrina can get a little help from him about love. But when Enchantra makes a surprise visit, hell breaks loose.

episodes.name: Witchitis
episodes.overview: Harvey has to get his measles shot and Pi starts to tell scary stories about getting shots from doctors. Sabrina boost his and her own confidence about getting shots, but when Hilda and Zelda take her to get a witchitis shot Pi's scary stories start to get to her and she eventually catches it from a magic cactus. Witchitis causes her magic to act wacky and makes her feel awful. Salem discovers that if she doesen't get the shot it can result to Hypogermia and when she catches it she finally gets her shot but has to pay a huge doctor's bill for the delay.

episodes.name: My Stepmother The Babe
episodes.overview: Sabrina is ecstatic that her father is coming to town. She wants to spend all her time with him but when she finds out that he has a new lover she drowns herself in sadness all over her new stepmother. Salem luckily gives her a spell to make her stepmother be more like her but it backfires and her real father doesen't like her anymore so she shows him the spell she used and then he catches it too!

episodes.name: Absence Of Malissa
episodes.overview: Sabrina goes to Witch Boot Camp and is abused by the captain, Melissa.

episodes.name: This Is Your Nine Lives
episodes.overview: It's Salem's birthday so Sabrina tries to get him a present by visiting Salem's 'friends' from the past.

episodes.name: Planet Of The Dogs
episodes.overview: Sabrina finds a stray dog that becomes intelligent when he finds the Spookie Jar.

episodes.name: Hex-Change Students
episodes.overview: Gem is expecting some Canadian exchange students and instead two fairies come named Dawson and Felicity who are always looking to cause trouble for mortals. Later on they run into Sabrina and they all remember being friends at camp Netherworld. To remain friends they start to cause trouble with Harvey and Chloe.

episodes.name: Saturday Night Furor
episodes.overview: Sabrina tries to help Quigley's love life.

episodes.name: Scare Apparent
episodes.overview: Sabrina tries to help out a boogieman that is scared of everything.

episodes.name: The Hex Files
episodes.overview: Sabrina's class goes to a science observatory. There she and Harvey visit Uncle Quigley who is doing very poorly at his science career. Sabrina and Salem try to boost his confidence by creating aliens for Uncle Quigley to discover. Only one problem she takes these aliens away from Harvey's video game and when the Science observatory finds out they kick Quigley out until some real aliens come that they all see and Quigley, Harvey, Sabrina, and Salem all send them back to their planet. Because of all of this Quigley is finally recognized as a great scientist.

episodes.name: Stone Broke
episodes.overview: Gem and the rest of the Stone's become broke and now she has to live with Sabrina. At first they have a rocky start but later Gem gets used to living live a middle class person. Unfortunately her dog Ruby finds oil on her property and she becomes rich again.

episodes.name: Salem's Plot
episodes.overview: Salem's friend is coming over to visit so Salem tries to hide the fact he's a cat.

episodes.name: Molar Molar
episodes.overview: Sabrina has rotten wisdom teeth and when she goes to the doctor they say that she gets to get them pulled out. Sabrina is afraid and lets the spookie jar get rid of them instead but when she lost her wisdom teeth she also lost her wisdom!

episodes.name: Harvzilla
episodes.overview: Harvey wants to go on the wrestling team but he doesen't have the type of strength that the other team members do. Sabrina cast a spell on him and soon Harvey starts to sprout muscles, but the spell goes out of hand until he turns into a giant dinosaur.

episodes.name: When In Rome
episodes.overview: A history teacher assigns Gem and Sabrina together as partners on a project on Rome. Gem becomes snotty though and hides the book on Rome in the spookie jar causing them to actually go to Rome. They are at first pitted against each other by Juilus Ceaser to fight but when it comes to going back home that's something they both agree on. They go back finish the report and Gem gets a brainwash, but in the end Sabrina discovered they made a great team.

episodes.name: Field Of Screams
episodes.overview: Sabrina and Chloe are on the baseball team and except for them the entire team stinks and loses every game, so Sabrina gets a spell from the Spookie Jar to conjure up a couple of players who really can play. After that they start winning games but they score up so many points they start to boot out the other players and take over the team themselves.

episodes.name: Driver Ed
episodes.overview: Hilda is the worst driver around and Sabrina wants her to drive her to this concert, so she uses the spookie jar to conjure up a spell to get a handsome driving teacher to make Hilda learn. Soon Zelda learns about him and the two start competing for Ed's affections. In the end Hilda gets her liscence and they both win his heart until Ed conjures back into his original form: a dog!

episodes.name: What Becomes Of The Broken Hearted?
episodes.overview: Sabrina goes to the Wise Warlock to find a cure for a broken heart.

episodes.name: Send In The Clones
episodes.overview: Sabrina is on many clubs at school and she can't handle all of the pressure so she creates 2 clones of herself to help her out but after a few orders these clones start to develop a mind of their own!

episodes.name: Feats Of Clay
episodes.overview: Sabrina tries to prove that Harveys Jackie Chan-esque hero is nothing more than an actor.

episodes.name: Generation Zap
episodes.overview: Sabrina and Enchantra accidently swap bodies. They realise that each other's lives are stressful but Stabbenback, Enchantras griffin servant, is trying to take over the netherworld!

episodes.name: Board & Sorcery
episodes.overview: The Spellman's go on a skiing trip and they invite Harvey along. He is soon challenged by Slugloaf and to make him into a better snowboarder Sabrina cast a spell that turns him into a snowman!

episodes.name: Enchanted Vacation
episodes.overview: Tim the Witch Smeller returns when Sabrina goes on a Netherworld vacation!

episodes.name: Moldy Oldie
episodes.overview: Sabrina's great grandad Gandalf comes to Greendale to renew his witchery license and causes trouble in the Spellman household.

episodes.name: Xabrina, Warrior Witch
episodes.overview: Harvey is the best at video games but when he gets this new ancient Greece video game he becomes so hooked that he won't put it down. Sabrina and Chloe become suspicious so when they enter the game they become Xabrina, Warrior Witch and Scabriella, The Battling Bard to save the day.

episodes.name: Straight Outta Paris
episodes.overview: Hida and Zelda take Sabrina to Paris and she has a boring time. She wants a soveneir so she tells Salem to conjure up a Paris perse but instead he conjures up a Paris person and the Eiffel tower becomes a boy. At first its bad but Eiffel reallly livens up Sabrina's life and just when their having a good time Zelda burst their bubble and tells them he has to turn back into tower but Eiffel refuses.

episodes.name: Strange New World
episodes.overview: Thomas Edison is brought intpo the present but ends up altering history.

episodes.name: Witchery Science Theatre
episodes.overview: Sabrina gets a bad haircut and to hide it from Harvey she decides to go to the movies. The movie they originally wanted was sold out so she cast a spell and she, Chloe, and Harvey get transported in an old 50's movie. There Sabrina learns that it doesen't matter what you look like on the outside it's what counts on the inside.

episodes.name: You've Got A Friend
episodes.overview: Sabrina makes Harveys old imaginary friend come to life.

episodes.name: Hexcalibur
episodes.overview: Sabrina and Salem destroy Zelda's old magic book that was written and signed by Merlin himself. They travel back in time to the middle ages to when Merlin first wrote the book but a problem occurs and they go to far up to when Merlin was 12 yrs old. Back then he was an amatuer at magic and his friend (King) Dude Arthur was terrible at magic so Sabrina and Salem teach them and soon they find the mighty sword of Excalibur which they need to use to defeat the evil forces that threaten Arthur from becoming King. In the end they win and Merlin gives Sabrina a new replaceable magic book for Zelda. She and Salem go back and put it back on the shelf but when they accidently destroy all of Zelda's other books too the adventure starts all over again.

episodes.name: Brina Baby
episodes.overview: Sabrina gives up witchcraft and starts becoming serious. Then Sabrinas 'inner witchlet' comes out and causes trouble.

episodes.name: Witchwrecked
episodes.overview: The class' field trip goes sour when they are alone on a desert island with alot of magic present.

episodes.name: Fish Schtick
episodes.overview: It is 'cliche week' and every cliche that a whitch says becomes reality. So when Sabrina gets jealous of the new girland wishes to 'swim like a fish' she becomes one! Now Salemn must take her to the mall and get help from Hilda and Zelda before she stays a fish forever!

episodes.name: Witchmas Carole
episodes.overview: In a parody of A Christmas Carol, Sabrina and her aunts dress up as ghosts to scare Gem.

episodes.name: Truth Or Scare
episodes.overview: Sabrina learns the downside of daring people when she goes into a 'haunted' mine.

episodes.name: Generation Hex
episodes.overview: Sabrina sees what the world would be like if she doesn't help out the library.

episodes.name: Working Witches
episodes.overview: Hilda and Zelda have a hard time carrying home grocceries so they get a job to earn a car, but Zelda does all the work and Hilda gets all the promotions so Zelda quits and Hilda has a hard time managing the job by herself. She eventually needs Zelda's help but it becomes to late and they both get demotions. Meanwhile, Salem needs Sabrina to be at a prize giving ceremony in Salem's place.

episodes.name: Wiccan Of The Sea
episodes.overview: Fed up with Winter, Sabrina and Chole use the Spooky Jar to travel to a tropical island, but the spell turns them into mermaids, and they have to protect a school of fish from an evil jellyfish.

episodes.name: Key To My Heart
episodes.overview: Sabrina falls in love with a music teacher.

episodes.name: La Femme Sabrina
episodes.overview: Harvey is ecstatic when a spy movie is supposed to come out today. He and Sabrina go to the movies but they find out that it has been postponed until next week. Harvey says he can't wait that long so Sabrina cast a spell saying that she wants the spy movie to be realesed all over the world today but there's a problemwhen everybody starts acting out the movie and becoming spys and secret agents.

episodes.name: The Bat Pack
episodes.overview: Three vampires come to town and try to show Sabrina a good time.
